title: antoclaus
author: antoclaus
content: 🚀🚀 Dear bit.bb community! 🚀🚀OFFICIAL: JUNE 2ND, 2022We are proud to announce the launch of our most sophisticated one-stop crypto trading platform!Let us tell some words about our wonderful project!Bit.bb is now officially live! Your personal digital platform combining traditional finance with the world of cryptocurrencies to offer absolute flexibility in using a wide range of payment and investment instruments.Here's a brief list of our services:✅ Spot ExchangeWith the security and transparency of a regulated crypto platform, Bit.bb will also offer professional crypto trading services for private persons as well as for institutional traders.✅ Margin trading moduleOur margin trading platform offers a wide array of various financial marketsmarkets: by aggregating a large number of liquidity channels, we provide access to an unprecedented wide range of more than 2,000 trading instruments at the same time.✅ Crypto WalletOur hybrid wallet will allow transactions both in crypto and fiat currencies. The team has already started working on issuing our debit cards to give every crypto enthusiast an option to pay for their daily expenses and purchases with crypto.✅ Social Trading:Bit.bb allows you to copy trades of leading traders. How does it work? You see the pro trades’s statistics. You then select a trader whose strategy looks most profitable and automatically set your account to copy any trades of the selected trader. Our platform will automatically do it all for you. One of the huge advantage of Bit.bb  is  total security. You retain full control over your assets. Therefore, CopyCash minimises the risks of investment losses due to theft, fraud or incorrect investment decisions made by asset managers.➡️ Traders get the opportunity to trade on their own, as well as attract investors to increase their profits. ➡️ Investors get the opportunity to select the best traders from the rating and automatically copy their trades.🔥BitBot has also started an active development of a number of upcoming new services, including NFT trading platform, AI trading, real estate tokenization and much more! 🔥🔥🔥 Stay tuned for more updates! 🔥🔥

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.created_time: June 03, 2022, 08:46:54 PMLast edit: May 14, 2023, 03:51:04 PM by JeromeTash
comments.body: Not sure why you are announcing a website that can't be accessed. I am getting the "DNS Points to prohibited IP" error both on VPN and Non VPN browser. I was curious about how your site looks or operated, but I guess I wouldn't be able to know since it's inaccessible.
